Plot: A sausage strives to discover the truth about his existence.
Title: Sausage Party
Writer: Kyle Hunter (screenplay), Ariel Shaffir (screenplay), Seth Rogen (screenplay), Evan Goldberg (screenplay), Seth Rogen (story by), Evan Goldberg (story by), Jonah Hill (story by)
Actors: Alistair Abell, Iris Apatow, Sugar Lyn Beard, Michael Cera
